data.question: What is the empirical formula of the synthesized coordination polymer?
What method was used for the synthesis of the uranium-zinc-organic coordination polymer?
At what temperature was the hydrothermal synthesis conducted to produce the coordination polymer?
What is the yield percentage of the coordination polymer based on uranium?
Does the coordination polymer exhibit high thermal stability?
Is the coordination polymer considered a two-dimensional semiconductor?
Does the coordination polymer emit green light under irradiation with 447-nm light?
What is the main peak emission wavelength of the coordination polymer?
What type of crystal system does the coordination polymer belong to?
What is the space group of the coordination polymer?
What is the role of triethylamine in the synthesis of the coordination polymer?
data.answer: It is added to the solution during the hydrothermal synthesis.

data.question: What happens to the pyridine-2,3-dicarboxylic acid during the hydrothermal reaction?
Can the coordination polymer be synthesized using a mixture of Zn(OAc)2·4H2O and UO2(OAc)2·2H2O?
Is the coordination polymer suitable for single-crystal structure analysis when synthesized from a mixture of Zn(OAc)2·4H2O and UO2(OAc)2·2H2O?
What is the main absorption peak wavelength of the coordination polymer?
Does the coordination polymer generate an anodic photocurrent under illumination without an external electric field?
What is the photocurrent density of the coordination polymer?
data.answer: Approximately 0.2 μA at 0.4 V applied voltage versus SCE

data.question: Is the carrier density in the coordination polymer easy to control?
data.answer: No, it contains controlled carrier density.

data.question: What potential application does the coordination polymer have due to its unusual physical properties?
data.answer: Fabrication of devices such as field effect transistors

data.question: What does the thermal treatment at 600 °C for 4 hours result in for the coordination polymer?
data.answer: The residue mainly consists of ZnU3O10.
